https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qSInchxGb3HbB1dIE6nLUx0j58d.jpg On September 13, 1971 the State of New York shot and killed 39 of its own citizens, injured hundreds more, and tortured the survivors. Elizabeth Fink tells the story of the Attica prison rebellion, and how she exposed the cover up. Betrayal at Attica
